venue.venue_name: Point A Hotel London Canary Wharf
Point A Hotel London Canary Wharf

items.badge_description: After a long day, what better way to kick back than with a crisp and refreshing lager? You're already feeling more relaxed, aren’t you?. That’s 325 different Lagers! Try 5 more for Level 66!

Whether you’re having a room party or hanging at the hotel bar, you know the essential part of any trip, an awesome beer!

That's a beer at 30 different venues categorized as a Hotel! Visit 5 more different ones for Level 7!

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 110 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 23!
After a long day, what better way to kick back than with a crisp and refreshing lager? You're already feeling more relaxed, aren’t you?. That’s 250 different Lagers! Try 5 more for Level 51!
Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 125 distinct venues!
You're exploring this great country the best way possible, one delicious beer at a time! That's one beer while in at least 25 states or countries. Visit 5 more for Level 6!
Traveling the world is hard, but not for you. It's as easy as cracking open a new brew! You have had a beer from at least 60 different regions around the world. Try 5 more for Level 13!

Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 25 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 6!

Kiwis, rugby and sheep aren’t the only things New Zealand has to offer. There’s a ton of great beers in a variety of styles just waiting for you to explore! That's 15 different beers from a brewery in New Zealand. Try 5 more for Level 4.
Happy Untappd anniversary to you! Thanks for sticking around and drinking socially with us. Cheers! That's 12 years on Untappd!

It can get pretty hot standing in the sun, but you’re obviously the smart one in the crowd because you’ve probably tracked down the beer tent! That's a beer at 10 different places categorized as a Convention Center, Fair, Event Space, Festival, Music Festival, or Beer Festival. Try 5 more places for Level 3!

items.checkin_comment: i’ve loved this beer since i was a teen. this takes me back to Jake Heke. this is the best big bottle beer. i wish this was a big bot. but alas it’s a public space and we have to be responsible. get your bloody wife bearer out! not tonight. 👎 cheers!

items.badge_description: Get out there and raise a ruckus with your favorite Amber or Red Ale! That's 65 different amber or red beers. Try 5 more for Level 14!

Beer and music share many similarities; different styles, different collaborations, some smooth, some loud. It’s no wonder they go together so well!

That's a beer at 5 different Music Venues! Visit 5 more different ones for Level 2!

Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 150 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 31!
